name: Tuc Tuc Arena
description:
Tuc Tuc Arena is a local multiplayer game, 2-4 players.

Each player controls a tuc tuc and has to capture the areas that appear randomly on the map.

Can be played with 4 gamepads or 3 gamepads and keyboard.

Thanks for playing!

Music and SFX from Kenney Asset Packs https://kenney.itch.io/

Used Pro Build and Pro Grids to make the level. https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/15447

Used InControl for the gamepad input contoller. https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/14695
